title: Update publication dates
body: Check footer, other locations in the document

title: Change LICENSE to MIT if open sourcing
body: By default things are copyright NPR

title: Analytics config
body:
- [ ] Standard events for completion and click interaction
- [ ] Dimensions set in the project.json file--steal the primary topic, topic ID, and secondary topic IDs from related stories.
- [ ] Document any custom events in the README

title: Verify page title tags are good
Determine what the publish URL will be
body: Workshop w/ the engagement team. Sort this out before requesting redirects.

title: Create Seamus stub/shell page and request redirects
body:
- [ ] Create page on live Seamus
- [ ] Make sure publish URLs are finalized
- [ ] Publish on staging (one day later, after DB syncs to stage)
- [ ] Publish on live
- [ ] Request redirects for staging and live
- [ ] Test redirects on staging
- [ ] Post-launch, ask sysadmins to remove any unneded redirects
- [ ] Note the Seamus ID, published URL and other relevant info in the [spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JuukYVK54wwYQiDedX-c-YMOc41fz-vEMrqCyiMpW2E/edit#gid=0)
https://github.com/nprapps/workinprivate/blob/master/shell_pages.md

title: Add promo images and text to Seamus stub/shell page
body: This is especially important if the page will also be syndicated to stations. Make sure there is a prominent link to the published project URL.

title: Setup retrospective review with editor
body: What did we learn? How do we do better next time?

title: Let the copy desk know an app is coming
Email media relations re: press releases
Email comms re: promoting the project in Nipper News
Alert stations about project
body: Specifically send a heads-up to stations with local interest. Determine if the stub page also will be syndicated/communicated to stations.

title: Draft promo language for social media with engagement team
Social metadata and images (for Twitter, Facebook)
body: Images should have an aspect ratio of 1.91:1 and be a minimum of 1200 x 630. Verify with debuggers: https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/ and https://dev.twitter.com/docs/cards/validation/validator

title: Distribute launch timeline
body: Let stakeholders, engagement, social media, etc know what the launch schedule is

title: Browser testing
body:
- [ ] Edge 
- [ ] Chrome (OS X)
- [ ] Chrome (Android) 
- [ ] Chrome (Windows)
- [ ] Chrome (iOS) 
- [ ] Firefox (OS X)
- [ ] Firefox (Windows)
- [ ] Safari (iOS)
- [ ] Safari (iOS, in-app)
- [ ] NPR One (iOS/Android, in-app)

title: Accessibility testing
body: Works in screen reader, does not violate WCAG 2.1

title: Update master sitemaps index and redeploy
body: Instructions and a script for generating/publishing the sitemap are checked into workinprivate (`generate_sitemap.sh`).

title: Add project to team projects list
Analytics report
body: Collect and study data one week after launch

title: Backport new features into the interactive template
